name: Little One
desc: A little Tepetlisaurus that received theBlessing. It accompanied the Traveler on a pilgrimage to the Great Volcano of Tollan to remove the mark.

customize.name: Tepetlisaur Whelp
customize.desc:
A young Tepetlisaurus with the ability to tunnel between rocks and solid phlogiston.
They have not yet formed the horns on their forehead, and their digging skills are still developing as well. It is even common to hear about young Tepetlisaurs getting trapped by rocks while practicing their digging. However, one day, they will grow into a form that may travel freely through even the toughest of soils.

customize.text: Little One is a special Tepetlisaur Whelp.

customize.name: Xiuhcoatl
customize.desc: The Pyro Sovereign, defeated by the first Pyro Archon, Xbalanque. He faked his own death, after which the descendants of the ancient dragons could only bow before the throne and watch as their civilization inevitably faded away with each passing day.

customize.text: Little One received the Flamelord's Blessing — a special mark on the horn, which grants a greater strength than an ordinary Saurian.

customize.name: Ancient Sacred Mountain
customize.desc: Before the descendants of the various tribes learned to record their history with woven scrolls, the ancient and proud nobility had already built a magnificent holy city here, scorning the land that those feeble slaves knew as "Natlantea." However, the vast empire that prided itself on its power has long since perished in battle. Only a lonely tomb remains of that mighty city.

customize.text: Little One was going on a pilgrimage to the volcano to remove the mark and regain the

customize.name: Night Kingdom
customize.desc: The Lord of the Night designed a realm of souls and memories to recreate the damaged Ley Lines in Natlan. The Night Kingdom is a mysterious, liminal space between the body and mind, life and death, where the souls of all the dead Natlanese go.

customize.name: Waxaklahun Ubah Kan
customize.desc: The wisest among dragons, who stole the flame from his kind and taught people how to use it. He wanted to create a ruler of the dragon and human worlds. His true name is Kukulkan.

customize.text: Waxaklahun Ubah Kan needed the Chosen of the Dragon to remove the seal from the Sacred City of Tollan, so he created a legend that a pilgrimage to the volcano can remove the Flamelord's Blessing. He lured Little One into the Heart of the Sacred City to activate Huitzilopochtli.

customize.name: Reaffirmed Accord of Appellation
customize.desc:
Just like when you first met and tied a scarf around his tail, now give him a new "name."
After giving him a new name, it cannot be changed again.

customize.name: Golden Entreaty
customize.desc: A white disc retrieved from the ruler of Cinder City's corroded ruins within Ochkanatlan. It is one of the essential tokens required to journey to the Great Volcano of Tollan and remove the "Flamelord's Blessing" from the little Tepetlisaur's body, and is said to have been one of the fragments left behind when the Flamelord's eye was split in two. According to legend, it is said that the ancient Dragonlord — who once held dominion over all light and wisdom — transformed one of his eyes into a conduit of supreme authority by which all flames might be governed, and that this became his only exploitable weakness...

customize.name: Golden Entreaty
customize.desc: A white disc retrieved from the ruins of the Sage of the Stolen Flame. It is one of the essential tokens required to journey to the Great Volcano of Tollan and remove the "Flamelord's Blessing" from the little Tepetlisaur's back. Golden inscriptions are etched into the surface of the white disc, and when touched, one can sense the intricate patterns pulsating as if imbued with life.

customize.name: Talisman of Waxaklahun Ubah Kan
customize.desc: The talisman of the Sage of the Stolen Flame. It is said that the sage who once stole phlogiston from a dragon's claws left this behind as proof of a pact made with the tribes.

customize.name: Photo With Travel Companions
customize.desc: A photo of you and your travel companions; a memento of a land where humans and saurians coexist. Though our paths may eventually diverge, the memories we create together shall never fade.

imgDesc.text: The Traveler, Little One, and Paimon in the ruins where Waxaklahun Ubah Kan and Xbalanque made an oath.
